basic_information.scholarship_name: Bob E. Palmer Scholarship for Visual Arts

description: This scholarship was established in 1996 by the Tom and Marye Kate Aldridge Foundation in honor of Dr. Bob Palmer, renowned muralist and retired UCO professor of art. Eligibility Art or art education major Cumulative GPA 3.0+ Sophomore, junior, senior or graduate student Enrolled in 6 hours of art coursework Demonstrate financial need Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Art Education   or SIS_Major_2 is Art-Studio Art   or SIS_Major_2 is Art   or SIS_Major is Art Education   or SIS_Major is Art-Studio Art   or SIS_Major is Art   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Art Education   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Art   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Art Education   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Art
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Art Education   or SIS_Major_2 is Art-Studio Art   or SIS_Major_2 is Art   or SIS_Major is Art Education   or SIS_Major is Art-Studio Art   or SIS_Major is Art   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Art Education   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Art   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Art Education   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Art

criteria.description: SIS_College is Fine Arts and Design   or SIS_College_2 is Fine Arts and Design
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Fine Arts and Design   or SIS_College_2 is Fine Arts and Design
